items.sentence: I guess things like this happen all the time in Boston.
I know that Tom and Mary have both finished doing that.
It\'s going to be hard to find somebody to replace Tom.
It\'s good that you were able to go to Boston with Tom.
It\'s hard to believe Tom would do something like that.
It\'s not a good idea to go out after dark by yourself.
Do you know what Tom\'s nickname was when he was a kid?
Instead of taking the elevator, let\'s take the stairs.
It isn\'t much fun to go mountain climbing by yourself.
Why don\'t you tell me something I don\'t already know?
